page.title: 12THE POLICE
page.content: P.C Diggins is our local{Community {Constable.}He used to work as a railway signal man. He wanted a job with interest,variety and excitement and mostly,he wanted to meet people. He went to a police training centre and trained for 10 weeks.It involved learning the law,learning to deal with crimes,and traffic laws.After 10 weeks he went back to{Wakefield}police headquarters.Then after 2 weeks on a local procedure course he was posted with a local policeman reporting offences,dealing with crimes and incidents.After 6 weeks he was allowed to do the beat on his own.In {Wakefield Town Centre.}22 months later he went on a 2 week refresher course.After that he went on an ordinary beat from{Dewsbury Police {Station.Main crimes in Mirfield are {juvenlie crime and shoplifting.
